text: [Chapter 19a] [Xuir Plain, Central Nolavillia]

speaker: left
text: I think we're being followed.

speaker: left
text: Prepare for battle!

speaker: left
text: I think that's all of the Xuirists here.
???: Errr... I've had enough of 'em crazy Xuirists.
???: Ya can't pay me 'nough to do this stuff.
???: You 'ere!

speaker: left
text: Me?
???: The hell else would I be talkin' to?
???: Ya probably hate the Xuirists, don't 'ya?
???: 'ey sent me out here to kill ya', after all.
???: Anyway, I've had 'nough of 'em crazy Xuirists.
???: Ya can't pay me 'nough to do another of 'em Xuir Rituals.
???: Since 'yer look like ya gonna fight 'em anyways, why not let us help ya?
[Recruit the Mercenaries?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit
???: That's a shame, ain't it?
???: It seems you may be struggling...

speaker: left
text: Who are you?
???: I am Geomer, a disciple in Geom theory.

speaker: right
text: You see, those Xuirists that you were just fighting were using Geom Energy.

speaker: right
text: Geom Energy is a very powerful force, and it seems you are unfamiliar to it.

speaker: right
text: As one wishing to spread the knowledge of Geom, I offer to aid you in combat using my Geom powers.
[Recruit Geomer?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: You fear knowledge, for you cannot comprehend it.
[Xuirist Cavern]

speaker: left
text: ...they have failed again.

speaker: right
text: Must I remind you of what will happen?

speaker: right
text: If you are out of troops to send out, then you must fight the Proto-Xuir to the death yourself.

speaker: left
text: He will be approaching our camp soon, I'll gather all of our troops here and slay him in our final battle.

speaker: left
text: I will not fail.

speaker: right
text: You better keep your word.
